name: Food Defender
description:
Defend your Hut! Collect Raw Meat from enemies and cook them to make meals!

Tip: Open to Full Screen (sorry need to fix bug)

A: Move Left

D: Move right

Space: Jump (Can double jump)

Left mouse: Attack

Assets:

Free 2D PlatformerAsset Pack (Unity Asset Store) by LaenamsoTeam

Free 2D Sprite (Unity Asset Store) by Chocolate Cake
